Function Documentation

int series ( int  a,
int  d,
int  n 
)

Calculate a + (a+d) + (a+2d) + .

.. + {a+(n-l)d}, where l = a + (n-1)d as the last term.

Parameters:
a The base (start) natural number.
d The incremental (natural) number.
n The number of repetition.
Returns:
n(a+l)/2
